senses.description:
without other number
a. before singular noun year Gen 5:12 +12 t., man Judg 9:2; Num 11:25 + 7 t., shekel Num 7:13 + 11 t.,
        other n. 5 t.

+ other number
a. + unit + singular noun Judg 8:14 noun omitted 70 + 7 (times) Gen 4:24, compare
        Ezra 2:40 =
        Neh 7:43 so 2
        + 70
        Num 31:38
        plural
        noun + 70 + 7 Ezra
            8:35
         5 years + 70 year 
            Gen 12:4.
